row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 14)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 17)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 1)
col_desc: Queen has zero mini challenge wins.
Queen has at least four lip sync wins.
Queen has one mini challenge win.
